title: Large-Scale Collaborative Learning-Based Language Education Transformation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Current practitioners engage in knowledge sharing and practical application projects in a collaborative learning environment to strengthen language competencies

learning_goals: Learners apply synchronous/asynchronous communication strategies with peers using collaborative learning tools at over 80% proficiency.
Learners produce three or more deliverables reflecting peer feedback in language practice projects.
Learners explain the collaborative learning design process according to the Carpe Diem methodology with 90% accuracy.
Learners participate in three or more peer assessment activities via a digital platform (LMS).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
